description: Advanced dependency analysis and security checking. Monitors for outdated packages, security vulnerabilities, and license compatibility.

hooks.command: if [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *package.json || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *requirements.txt || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *Cargo.toml || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *pom.xml || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *Gemfile ]]; then echo "Dependency file modified: $GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *package.json ]] && command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm audit 2>/dev/null || true; npx npm-check-updates 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *requirements.txt ]] && command -v safety >/dev/null 2>&1; then safety check -r "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *Cargo.toml ]] && command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1; then cargo audit 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi
